### About Us

The Healthcare Information Management Association of the Philippines, Inc. (HIMAP) represents the Philippine HIMS sector in the global market, and it brands and markets the Philippines as a preferred outsourcing destination for healthcare IT-BPM sector.

### Help Links

- [About Us](http://himap.ph/about-us/)
- [Members](http://himap.ph/members/)
- [Events](http://himap.ph/events/)
- [Contact Us](http://contact%20us/)

### Contact Information

**Address:** IBPAP Office, C2 Building, Bonifacio Highstreet Central, 28th Street corner 7th Avenue, Bonifacio Global City, Taguig City Philippines

**Phone:** (+632) 8172727 loc. 812

**Email:** info@himap.ph

**Website:** www.himap.ph
